short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fed up with reading briefings from an anonymous 'No 10 source' when we all know who it is?

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension replaces all occurrences of the phrase "No 10 source" on any webpage with "Dominic Cummings". Because we weren't born yesterday.

That's all it does.
